Tama-san, shitsumon ga arimasu...

(for those who don't know Japanese, that's "I have a question" ^_^)

I'm conducting research on the Boshin War, and I was wondering-- is there 
anywhere I can get a list of the hatamoto and gokenin of Nagaoka han? This 
was the domain in Echigo, ruled by the daimyo Makino Tadayuki, and was 
famous for having the local army under Kawai Tsuginosuke, using Gatling 
guns. Any information would be VERY much appreciated.

Domo arigatou gozaimasu!!!

--Masayoshi
